data.body: Closed bead fetches are expensive and should only happen when user explicitly selects closed/retakes views. Default list/final-cut/history views must not trigger status=closed queries.
data.description: Closed bead fetches are expensive and should only happen when user explicitly selects closed/retakes views. Default list/final-cut/history views must not trigger status=closed queries.
data.title: Stop closed-bead queries unless explicitly requested
